conversation.message:
Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for your note, and I appreciate how clearly you’ve communicated your flexibility and ability to confirm immediately.

At this stage, it is **more likely than not** that we will be able to finalize with one of the families we are currently prioritizing **within the next round**, but it is **not guaranteed** until we receive a firm confirmation. So: **likely to finalize with a preferred family**, but still **some uncertainty** remains.

If we do not receive a confirmation (or if circumstances change), we would then move to contingency options and would contact you promptly. Given the uncertainty, I would still encourage you to continue progressing your other options in parallel.

If helpful, you’re welcome to check back with us after the next round if you haven’t heard from us sooner.

Kind regards,
Nursery_C Admissions
